actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to review criteria used to certify qualified development companies to ensure that application of such criteria does not adversely affect certification of qualified development companies in rural areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to review and modify regulatory certification guidelines (including minimum population requirements) to ensure that their application does not adversely affect certification of a qualified development company in a rural area. Requires the Administrator to report to the Congress on the results of such review.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to review criteria used to certify qualified development companies to ensure that application of such criteria does not adversely affect certification of qualified development companies in rural areas, and for other purposes.
